attributes.action: motorbike track area for children and youth in our community salford
attributes.additional_details: We propose that Lower Broughton community, park, or Kersal wetlands could be considered for this project, or that the council consider allocating land where such a track can be developed. We are open to working with local clubs, volunteers, to help manage and maintain the area if required. There is a growing interest among young people in recreational dirt biking and motorbike riding. Unfortunately, there are currently no safe or designated areas where children can ride.

We have to reject petitions that call for action at a local level.

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
